1.question:
Name the person who replaced Ozzy Osbourne as Black Sabbath's lead singer?
(a) Ronnie James Dio
(b) Judas Priest
(c) Dokken
(d) Whitesnake
1.more_info: Ronnie James Dio replaced original vocalist Ozzy Osbourne in 1979, and initially recorded two studio albums.

2.question:
Name the all-time best-selling movie soundtrack?
(a) I have nothing
(b) My love is your love
(c) Waiting to exhale
(d) The Bodyguard: Original Soundtrack Album
2.more_info: The Bodyguard is the best-selling soundtrack album of all time, selling 45 million copies worldwide.

3.question:
Name the first person to appear on the cover of the Rolling stones magazine?
(a) Peter Bowes
(b) John Lennon
(c) Richard Gere
(d) Tom Petty
3.more_info: The first issue appeared on Nov. 9, 1967, with John Lennon on the cover.

4.question:
The first hispanic to be inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame is whom?
(a) Carlos Santana
(b) Cindy Blackman
(c) Rob Thomas
(d) John Lee Hooker
4.more_info: Carlos Santana became the Hispanic to be voted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame in 1998.

5.question:
Among the following name the hymn written by John Newton?
(a) Ave Maria
(b) Holy Holy Holy
(c) Rock of Ages
(d) Amazing Grace
5.more_info: The beloved hymn and its author John Newton, a former enslaver, have inspired a new Broadway musical. 'Amazing Grace' is one of the most beloved hymns of the last two centuries
